senses.synonym: 00494753-n (a card game similar to whist; usually played for stakes);00860015-n (sleeping for a short period of time (usually not in bed));03942321-n (the yarn (as in a rug or velvet or corduroy) that stands up from the weave; \""for uniform color and texture tailors cut velvet with the pile running the same direction\"");04954264-n (a soft or fuzzy surface texture);15298612-n (a period of time spent sleeping; \""he felt better after a little sleep\""; \""there wasn't time for a nap\"");00015491-v (take a siesta; \""She naps everyday after lunch for an hour\""
